Hello Phillip,

We are looking forward to this collaboration.

Thanks

                                Genesis Hung & Lui Hung
                        CONTENT CREATOR
       TikTok | Facebook | Instagram | YouTube


  


On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 5:36 PM Genesis and Lui Hung <lafamiliahunginfo@gmail.com> wrote:

Hi Chubby Group team,

Thank you so much for getting back to us, we’re really excited about the chance to visit and try your amazing Wagyu experience! It definitely sounds like something our audience would enjoy.

We just wanted to share that most of our brand collaborations are usually paid partnerships, especially when there are specific requests for content on TikTok and Instagram.

We’d love to know if you’re open to discussing a paid opportunity as well. We can send over our media kit and talk about a contentplan that works for both of us.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,



                               La Familia Hung
                                Genesis Hung & Lui Hung
                        CONTENT CREATOR
       TikTok | Facebook | Instagram | YouTube


  


On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 5:26 PM Phillip ChubbyGroup <phillip@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Hi Genesis and Lui Hung,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Let us know if you're interested in moving forward:
a) Preferred Location
b) Date and time for the visit (Preferably a weekday or Friday/Sunday noon)
c) Full name for reservation
d) A contact phone number
e) Any dietary restrictions
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Best,

Chubby Group

body.text:

I would love to try the NY location! Wednesday after 7pm or Fridays in May
after 7pm would be great.

To confirm, is this a comped meal for 2 guests?

-Erica

Hi Phillip,

I would love to try the NY location! Wednesday after 7pm or Fridays in May after 7pm would be great. 

To confirm, is this a comped meal for 2 guests?

-Erica

On Thu, Apr 24, 2025 at 10:00 AM Phillip ChubbyGroup <phillip@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi emme.nyc, 
 
I'm Phillip from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about mooncake festival celebration on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in asian-inspired candles topics. Your influence in your area is really impressive and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants: 

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Covina: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Rowland Heights, Chubby Cattle
Monterey Park, Chubby Cattle
Pleasanton, Chubby Cattle

Other Cities:
New York City: NIKU X
Chicago: Chubby Cattle
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle
Las Vegas: The X Pot Las Vegas
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle
Houston: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House


Please reply with: 
A) Your preferred restaurant location 
B) Your availability within the next three weeks (preferably weekdays)

Looking forward to seeing you soon,  
Phillip
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group

Hi Blair,

Thank you so much for confirming Xpot! Do you know what time the reservation is for? 

Also, if you could let me know about any of the California restaurants and if there's time available for me to come during my trip next week that would be great because I'd love to come and film some content. Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you!

Kind regards,
Irene Kim

On Wed, Apr 23, 2025 at 9:08 PM Blair ChubbyGroup <blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi, thank you for your availability. You're a very impressive traveler. I have put down a time at June 6th Las Vegas XPot. Here are the posting requirements:


Location: Grand Canal Shoppes At The Palazzo, Fl 2 3327 S Las Vegas Blvd, Suite 2884 Las Vegas

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside and can enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes. 

High-End Fusion Cuisine: Features unique dishes like Wagyu Tartarte and King Crab Cake, blending Asian and Western culinary traditions.

Exclusive Meat Offerings: Certified Kobe beef and expertly aged Wagyu.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

#Hashtages: #LasVegasEats #LasVegas #HotPot #Wagyu #Luxury #FineDinning #VenetianResort #Palazzo

[Instagram]

Tag people (invite collaborators): @xpotlv @chubby.group

Add location: The X Pot

[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @thexpot @chubby.group

Location: The X Pot (3327 LasVegas Blvd S, Clark, Nevada 89109, USA)

Point of Contact:
Cecilia: 8668889768

Let us know if you're interested in moving forward:
 a) A contact phone number
 b) Any dietary restrictions

On Tue, Apr 22, 2025 at 2:30 PM Cecilla ChubbyGroup <cecilla@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Dear Andrea & Lewis,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Cecilla ChubbyGroup

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside and can enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

Dear waheeda khan,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Ophelia

Dear Amir Hangry,
Thank you for your interest in The X Pot Las Vegas — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: Grand Canal Shoppes At The Palazzo, Fl 2 3327 S Las Vegas Blvd, Suite 2884 Las Vegas

Premium Ingredients: A5 Wagyu, hot pot broth crafted from pure spring water and premium ingredients.

Affordable Luxury: We serve premium Wagyu, sourced from the finest supply chain for unparalleled quality.

Futuristic Dining Experience: 360-degree HD projections and interactive light shows.

Interactive Dining: Diners cook their own ingredients tableside andcan enjoy exclusive live performances, such as the face-changing ceremony and noodle dance, with select dishes.


High-End Fusion Cuisine: Features unique dishes like Wagyu Tartarte and King Crab Cake, blending Asian and Western culinary traditions.

Exclusive Meat Offerings: Certified Kobe beef and expertly aged Wagyu.

Luxury Atmosphere: Offers a unique blend of fine dining and entertainment, creating a multi-sensory culinary experience.

Signature Dishes: The Chef's Tasting Menu offers an exquisite selection, including Wagyu Tartare, Bone Marrow Bibimbap, Golden Wagyu Rice with Truffle, and more, accompanied by a rich broth and an extensive array of premium ingredients for cooking.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

Dear Phillip Tang,
Thank you for your interest in Chubby Cattle Chicago — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location: 2162 S Archer Ave, Chicago, IL 60616

Required:
1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique items like Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks.

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks

Optional Talking Points:
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

Dear Andrea & Lewis,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:


"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.


[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxnyc

Add location: NIKU X NYC


[Tiktok]

@ Mention: @nikuxla

Location: Midtown South (New York, United States)

Point of Contact:
ophelia: 2125108212"


Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Cecilla ChubbyGroup

On Mon, Apr 21, 2025 at 9:02 PM Adrian ChubbyGroup <adrian@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:
Hi, sorry for the late reply. I have tried talking to our locations in northCal to add this reservation. Unfortunately, these locations are extremely busy recently. 
However, we have Chubby Cattle - Pleasanton opening up in Mid May! And I would love to have you as one of our first collaborator. May I send a follow up email and schedule a visit for you in May?

Here are the details:

2693 Stoneridge Dr #106,
Pleasanton, CA 94588

Required: 
1. Premium Ingredients: Imported purebred A5 Wagyu beef flown in from Japan.

2. All-You-Can-Eat Wagyu: Offers three premium tiers ranging from $55 to $85, featuring American, Australian, and Japanese A5 Wagyu.

3. Diverse Menu: Includes not only Wagyu but also curated seafood (shrimp, scallops) and unlimited sushi (like Salmon Nigiri and Wagyu Nigiri).
Signature Hot Dishes: Features unique items like Wagyu Tartare, Sukiyaki Hot Pot, and A5 Wagyu Stone Pot Bibimbap.
Desserts and Snacks: Serves desserts like milk tea, ice cream, and Asian snacks. 

4. Chubby Club Membership (Clear CTA encouraging sign-ups for Chubby Club Membership)
Membership Benefits Across 35+ Locations,
Save up to $20 per visit at any Chubby Group restaurant and VIP perks 

Optional Talking Points: 
5. Affordable Luxury: Serves premium wagyu at a lower cost due to bulk purchasing and in-house partnerships.

6. Interactive Dining: Automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery. 

#Hashtages: #ChicagoFoodie #ChinatownEats #SushiLoversChicago #AllYouCanEatChicago

Tag people (invite collaborators): @chubby.group

Add location: Chubby Cattle Pleasanton

Location: Chubby Cattle Pleasanton

Hi juyoungkang, 

Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!

We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
  • The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
  • The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
  • The overall ambiance and level of service we provide

While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.

Interactive Dining: Guests pick ingredients and cook them in hot pots at the table, automated ordering system and tableside service for quick delivery.

items.subject: Re: Exclusive Dining Experience partnership | La familia Hung

body.text:
Hi Chubby Group team,

Thank you so much for getting back to us, we’re really excited about the
chance to visit and try your amazing Wagyu experience! It definitely sounds
like something our audience would enjoy.

We just wanted to share that most of our brand collaborations are usually
paid partnerships, especially when there are specific requests for content
on TikTok and Instagram.

We’d love to know if you’re open to discussing a paid opportunity as well.
We can send over our media kit and talk about a content plan that works for
both of us.

Looking forward to hearing from you!

Best,


                               *La Familia Hung*
*                                Genesis Hung & Lui Hung*

Hi Chubby Group team,

Thank you so much for getting back to us, we’re really excited about the chance to visit and try your amazing Wagyu experience! It definitely sounds like something our audience would enjoy.

We just wanted to share that most of our brand collaborations are usually paid partnerships, especially when there are specific requests for content on TikTok and Instagram.

We’d love to know if you’re open to discussing a paid opportunity as well. We can send over our media kit and talk about a content plan that works for both of us.

The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations

While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.

e) Any dietary restrictions

Best,

Chubby Group

Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.

"Location:
21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

body.text:
Hi Phillip,

I hope you’re doing great! My name is Genesis Hung from La Familia Hung, a
multicultural family content platform based in Orange, California. We
create joyful, authentic content that highlights family experiences, and
we’d love to showcase the experience your restaurants offer.

We’re passionate about discovering and sharing exceptional restaurants
moments with our audience, and Chubby Group caught our attention as a
standout destination. Your restaurants blend sophistication, flavor, and
experience, something we know our community would love to explore.

We’d be thrilled to partner with you and help spotlight your brand across
our platforms. We currently have:


   -

   3.2M followers on TikTok
   -

   1.7M on Facebook
   -

   580K on Instagram
   -

   117K subscribers on YouTube

We focus on multicultural lifestyle, food, travel, and family life. A
collaboration with Chubby Group would be an amazing fit for the type of
premium, memorable moments we love to share.

Here are links to our main channels:


   -

   TikTok: @lafamiliahung <https://www.tiktok.com/@lafamiliahung>

21 W 35th St New York, NY 10001 United States

First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.

body.html:
Hello, thank you for reaching out, I appreciate it! The location that would be best and closest to me would be HOUSTON. Do yall have any in Dallas area? I recently moved there. If not HTX would be best. Once again thank you for reaching out to me. 😄🙏🏻

On Sat, Apr 12, 2025 at 9:04 AM Peter Chen <peter@creatorain.com> wrote:
Hi jasssbg, 
 
I'm Peter from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about dance challenge on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in cultural fusion topics. Your influence in Fort Worth is really impressive and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants: 

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Los Angeles: NIKU X
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park: WEWE Mart (Merch Store)
 
Other Cities:
New York City: NIKU X
Chicago: Chubby Cattle Chicago
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle Las Vegas
Las Vegas: The X Pot Las Vegas
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle Philadelphia
Houston: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House


Please reply with: 
A) Your preferred restaurant location 
B) Your availability within the next three weeks  

Looking forward to seeing you soon,  
Peter
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group

Hi Thiza Brustolin,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provide plenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
Raymone ChubbyGroup
Chubby Group

Dear IamfromKorea,
Thank you for your interest in NIKU X — we are excited to have you! I am confirming your reservation with our manager now, and you’ll get a final confirmation email shortly.
Your visit includes a complimentary dining experience for you and a guest, and we'd love if you shared your authentic experience with your Instagram and TikTok audiences, highlighting:

Location: Wilshire Grand Centers 900 Wilshire Blvd. Suite 212 Los Angeles, CA 90017
First of Its Kind: They’re the only restaurant in the U.S. offering a fresh (never-frozen) A5 Wagyu steak buffet—an unlimited, premium experience hard to find anywhere else.
Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.
High-End & Contemporary: Located in The Wilshire Grand Center (Suite 212, the tallest building in Los Angeles), the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.
Elevated Buffet Experience: Inspired by its sister brand, The XPot, NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.
Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.[Instagram]
Tag people: @nikuxla @chubby.group
Add location: Niku X Los Angles
[Tiktok]
@ Mention: @nikuxla
Location: Niku X ( 900 Wilshire Blvd, Los Angeles)

Point of Contact:ophelia: 3239200302"

Feel free to follow the guidelines, but don’t hesitate to add your own flair — we want it to match your style. You can find more details and upload your content here:
https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group

In the meantime, could you please share:
a) Full name for reservation
b) A contact phone number
c) Any dietary restrictions

Best,
Blair ChubbyGroup

Wide Selection: More than 50 dishes are available, including king crab, lobster, premium seafood, and Japanese sushi. It’s a combination of AYCE (All You Can Eat) variety with high-end ingredients.

High-End & Contemporary: the interior features ultra-modern Robatayaki grills, tile mosaics, and an open-kitchen concept.

Elevated Buffet Experience: NIKU X merges luxury dining with the indulgence of an unlimited buffet, creating a “culinary journey” that emphasizes craft and quality.

Convenient Hours: Open for dinner every day (with later hours on weekends) and weekend lunch service—a flexible schedule for those looking to enjoy fresh A5 Wagyu and premium seafood at any time.

body.text:
Hi Blair,

Thanks so much for reaching out and thinking of Jen. She’d love to have this dining experience, and would like to try the X Pot in Las Vegas. She is pretty open in May and can make most dates work as of now. Can you let me know any more details she should be aware of or anything else you are asking for here?

Thank you,
Becca

[photo]
BECCA LONNGREN
P 310.691.7068<tel:310.691.7044>

*Please note my new email address blonngren@circlemp.com<mailto:blonngren@circlemp.com>




From: Blair ChubbyGroup <blair@collabs.chubbygroup.com>
Date: Friday, April 11, 2025 at 4:53 PM
To: Becca Lonngren <blonngren@circlemp.com>
Subject: Exclusive Invitation: Premium Dining Experience with Chubby Group for thejenglv
Hi thejenglv,

I'm Blair from Chubby Group – a premium Japanese Wagyu fine-dining chain. I saw your recent video about kitchen basics salmon recipe on Instagram and began exploring more of your content in cooking basics topics. Your influence in your area is really impressive and I'd like to invite you for a complimentary dining experience (with plus one, usually valued at $120-$180) at any of our restaurants:

California:
Los Angeles: Chubby Cattle Little Tokyo
Los Angeles: NIKU X
Beverly Hills: Chubby Curry
Cerritos: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House
Monterey Park: WEWE Mart (Merch Store)

Other Cities:
New York City: NIKU X
Chicago: Chubby Cattle Chicago
Chicago: Wagyu House by The X Pot
Las Vegas: Chubby Cattle Las Vegas
Las Vegas: The X Pot Las Vegas
Philadelphia: Chubby Cattle Philadelphia
Houston: Mikiya Wagyu Shabu House


Please reply with:
A) Your preferred restaurant location
B) Your availability within the next three weeks

Looking forward to seeing you soon,
Blair
Marketing Manager
Chubby Group

items.subject: Re: Exclusive Dining Experience Invitation

body.text:
Hi Morgan,

Thanks for reaching out! I hope you're having a great day.
I have heard so much about Chubby Group, and would love to try Mikiya Wagyu
Shabu Shabu at your San Mateo location.

My availability is as follows by order of preference:
Saturday - May 3rd, 2025 (Lunch)
Friday - May 2nd, 2025 (Dinner)
-
Tuesday - April 22nd, 2025 (Dinner)
Wednesday - April 23, 2025 (Dinner)

Please let me know if any of these dates work for your team.
With Mother's Day approaching, I was hoping I could invite my mom and
brother to join me.
In return, I would love to create a short video and a series of Instagram
stories showcasing Mikiya and my experience, potentially tying it as a
great place to take your friends and family for a one of a kind experience.

I'd love to know your thoughts, and thank you again for reaching out to me!

Best,
Katia

body.html:
No thank you the complimentary offering is pretty low so I won’t be able to enjoy all the top dishes as I would normally do on my own dime. Also your ask to upload through your portal isn’t necessary as I can just upload it on my socials. 

If you decide to change your mind and increase your offering so I can try the best items on the menu let me know also for something like this I would have to charge and I only do honest reviews. If a budget opens up let me know and if you need more details about my process let me know 

On Fri, Apr 18, 2025 at 1:16 PM April ChubbyGroup <april@collabs.chubbygroup.com> wrote:

Hi Mohamed Traore,
Thank you so much for your interest in details about Chubby Group — we're thrilled about the potential of working together!
We’re currently offering a complimentary fine dining experience for you and a guest (valued between $120–$180) in exchange for your authentic content on Instagram and/or TikTok. During your visit, we’d love for you to highlight:
The flavor, texture, and superior quality of our purebred A5 Wagyu beef and imported seafood, flown in daily from Japan
The presentation and consistency of our culinary creations
The overall ambiance and level of service we provide
While we’re not offering additional monetary compensation for this collaboration, we’re confident this experience will provideplenty of premium content that aligns with your audience and creative style.
Feel free check out the details and upload your video directly to our platform here: https://influencers.creatorain.com/auth/creator-signup/chubby-group
Let us know if you'd like to move forward, and I’d be happy to coordinate next steps — including checking reservation availability.
Best,
April ChubbyGroup
